p: In China, Baidu is the most popular search engine, and approximately 86.7% of internet users prefer it [ 30]. Some recent studies have explored the potential of using Baidu search queries to predict diseases such as influenza [ 31] and erythromelalgia [ 32]. However, there has been no similar study in utilizing such data for DF prediction in China. Therefore, the aim of this study is to examine whether an early warning model utilizing internet-based dengue query data can improve DF prediction.
